E_NO_CLIENT_DATA: Something went wrong while we were retrieving your client data. Please refresh the window and try again.
E_NO_AGENCY_DATA: Something went wrong while we were retrieving your agency data. Please refresh the window and try again.
E_NO_CLIENT_ID: We were unable to retrieve the ID for this client. Please refresh the window and try again.
E_NO_OFFICE_DATA: Something went wrong while we were retrieving your client's office data. You'll still be able to work with this client, but some features may be disabled.
E_NO_CLAIMS_DATA: Something went wrong while loading the Claims. Please refresh the page and try again.
E_NO_CLIENT_KEY: An error has occurred while attempting to load the client. Please contact HawkSoft support.
E_NO_PERM_META: Something went wrong while we were retrieving your agency's permissions. You'll still be able to work with this client, but some features may be disabled.
E_NO_LINK_DATA: Something went wrong while we were retrieving your client Links. Please refresh the window and try again.
